00020 
00021 #ifndef __TBB_recursive_mutex_H
00022 #define __TBB_recursive_mutex_H
00023 
00024 #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00025 
00026 #include <windows.h>
00027 #if !defined(_WIN32_WINNT)
00028 // The following Windows API function is declared explicitly;
00029 // otherwise any user would have to specify /D_WIN32_WINNT=0x0400
00030 extern "C" BOOL WINAPI TryEnterCriticalSection( LPCRITICAL_SECTION );
00031 #endif
00032 
00033 #else /* if not _WIN32||_WIN64 */
00034 
00035 #include <pthread.h>
00036 namespace tbb { namespace internal {
00037 // Use this internal TBB function to throw an exception
00038   extern void handle_perror( int error_code, const char* what );
00039 } } //namespaces
00040 
00041 #endif /* _WIN32||_WIN64 */
00042 
00043 #include "tbb_stddef.h"
00044 
00045 namespace tbb {
00047 
00049 class recursive_mutex {
00050 public:
00052     recursive_mutex() {
00053 #if TBB_USE_ASSERT
00054         internal_construct();
00055 #else
00056   #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00057         InitializeCriticalSection(&impl);
00058   #else
00059         pthread_mutexattr_t mtx_attr;
00060         int error_code = pthread_mutexattr_init( &mtx_attr );
00061         if( error_code )
00062             tbb::internal::handle_perror(error_code,"recursive_mutex: pthread_mutexattr_init failed");
00063 
00064         pthread_mutexattr_settype( &mtx_attr, PTHREAD_MUTEX_RECURSIVE );
00065         error_code = pthread_mutex_init( &impl, &mtx_attr );
00066         if( error_code )
00067             tbb::internal::handle_perror(error_code,"recursive_mutex: pthread_mutex_init failed");
00068 
00069         pthread_mutexattr_destroy( &mtx_attr );
00070   #endif /* _WIN32||_WIN64*/
00071 #endif /* TBB_USE_ASSERT */
00072     };
00073 
00074     ~recursive_mutex() {
00075 #if TBB_USE_ASSERT
00076         internal_destroy();
00077 #else
00078   #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00079         DeleteCriticalSection(&impl);
00080   #else
00081         pthread_mutex_destroy(&impl); 
00082 
00083   #endif /* _WIN32||_WIN64 */
00084 #endif /* TBB_USE_ASSERT */
00085     };
00086 
00087     class scoped_lock;
00088     friend class scoped_lock;
00089 
00091 
00093     class scoped_lock : private internal::no_copy {
00094     public:
00096         scoped_lock() : my_mutex(NULL) {};
00097 
00099 
00100         scoped_lock( recursive_mutex& mutex ) {
00101             acquire( mutex );
00102         }
00103 
00105         ~scoped_lock() {
00106             if( my_mutex ) 
00107                 release();
00108         }
00109 
00111         void acquire( recursive_mutex& mutex ) {
00112 #if TBB_USE_ASSERT
00113             internal_acquire( mutex );
00114 #else
00115             my_mutex = &mutex;
00116   #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00117             EnterCriticalSection(&mutex.impl);
00118   #else
00119             pthread_mutex_lock( &mutex.impl );
00120   #endif /* _WIN32||_WIN64 */
00121 #endif /* TBB_USE_ASSERT */
00122         }
00123 
00125         bool try_acquire( recursive_mutex& mutex ) {
00126 #if TBB_USE_ASSERT
00127             return internal_try_acquire( mutex );
00128 #else
00129             bool result;
00130   #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00131             result = TryEnterCriticalSection(&mutex.impl)!=0;
00132   #else
00133             result = pthread_mutex_trylock(&mutex.impl)==0;
00134   #endif /* _WIN32||_WIN64 */
00135             if( result )
00136                 my_mutex = &mutex;
00137 
00138             return result;
00139 #endif /* TBB_USE_ASSERT */
00140         }
00141 
00143         void release() {
00144 #if TBB_USE_ASSERT
00145             internal_release ();
00146 #else
00147   #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00148             LeaveCriticalSection(&my_mutex->impl);
00149   #else
00150             pthread_mutex_unlock(&my_mutex->impl);
00151   #endif /* _WIN32||_WIN64 */
00152             my_mutex = NULL;
00153 #endif /* TBB_USE_ASSERT */
00154         }
00155 
00156     private:
00158         recursive_mutex* my_mutex;
00159 
00161         void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD internal_acquire( recursive_mutex& m );
00162 
00164         bool __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD internal_try_acquire( recursive_mutex& m );
00165 
00167         void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD internal_release();
00168     };
00169 
00170     // Mutex traits
00171     static const bool is_rw_mutex = false;
00172     static const bool is_recursive_mutex = true;
00173     static const bool is_fair_mutex = false;
00174 
00175 private:
00176 #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00177     CRITICAL_SECTION impl;
00178     enum state_t {
00179         INITIALIZED=0x1234,
00180         DESTROYED=0x789A,
00181     } state;
00182 #else
00183     pthread_mutex_t impl;
00184 #endif /* _WIN32||_WIN64 */
00185 
00187     void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD internal_construct();
00188 
00190     void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD internal_destroy();
00191 };
00192 
00193 } // namespace tbb 
00194 
00195 #endif /* __TBB_recursive_mutex_H */
